title: Cab booking and ride sharing
content:
# Ola App Guide

## Navigation
- **Bottom Navigation Bar**: Switch between **Home**, **Parcel** (delivery), **Kruti** (AI assistant), **Electric** (EV purchasing/info), and **Loans** (finance).
- **Map Interface**: The home screen uses proprietary **"OLA MAPS"** to display your location and nearby vehicles.
- **Menu & Favorites**: Tap the **Three-line menu** (top-left) for settings or the **Heart icon** (top-right) to save favorite locations.

## Search
- **Destination Search**: Tap the large **"Search Destination"** bar to begin.
- **Route Planning**: Enter your **Pickup** (Green dot) and **Destination** (Red dot). Use the **Plus (+)** button next to the destination field to "Add up to two stops" en route.
- **Quick Access**: The search screen lists recent locations (e.g., "Patna Railway Station") for one-tap entry.

## Common Actions
- **Select Ride**: After entering a destination, choose from options like **Auto**, **Mini**, **Mini Non AC**, or **Bike**. Prices (e.g., â‚¹120) and ETA (e.g., "6 min") are shown clearly.
- **Book Any**: Use the **"Book Any"** option to request multiple car types (Mini, Prime Sedan, Prime Plus) simultaneously to get the fastest available ride.
- **Change Payment**: Tap the **"Cash"** (or card/UPI) button at the bottom left of the booking screen to switch payment methods.
- **Service Types**: Use the tiles on the home screen to book specific services like **Outstation** (intercity), **Rentals** (hourly packages), or **Parcel**.

## Tips
- **Mini Non-AC**: Look for the **"Mini Non-AC"** option or banner ("Say Yes to lighter fares") for a more affordable car ride without air conditioning.
- **Coupons**: Tap the **Coupon** button (green tag icon) next to the payment option to apply discounts before booking.
- **Book for Others**: Use the **"Myself"** profile toggle at the bottom right to book a ride for a friend or family member.
